questions.Question1: Your partner enters the room in a new outfit, they ask you how they look, what is your response?

Choice1.Option C: I think it would look better on the floor baby. Rrraaooow!

Choice1.Question2: A clown stands before you, wearing your fathers clothes. He prophesises your death in 7 years. How does he say you die?
Choice2.Option C: I think it would look better on the floor baby. Rrraaooow!
